WorkItem.Description:
The current Moonkin model is incorrectly recommending you not use insect swarm claiming it is a DPS loss even when it is Glyphed.  If need be, I can provide a sample xml file.
 
The spreadsheet models say that insect swarm is a DPS gain.
 
There is some discussion of this on pages 81 & 82 of the http://elitistjerks.com/f73/t37039-moonkin_raiding/p82/ including one persons analysis of how it is being incorrectly calculated.

Comments.Message: I know this issue wasn't really talked about, but it was resolved in 2.2.23.  An additional fix was made to the spell calculations that will be in 2.2.24, which should hopefully clean up the last of this problem.
